configOptions.description: List views to be removed from all objects (in the format of a list). Can be a regular expression e.g. /[a-z]/. Can be negative i.e. remove except e.g. !/KeepThis/. Default: none

configOptions.description: List views to be removed (in the format of an Object to List View map). Can be a regular expression e.g. /[a-z]/. Can be negative i.e. remove except e.g. !/KeepThis/. Default: none
configOptions.name: Object > List Views

description: Remove list views
